main event: Three witnesses reported observing three flashing red oval-shaped objects moving erratically in the vicinity of jet fighters from Shaw AFB on 13 November 1967.
interesting points: There were three confirmed witnesses to the sighting., The objects were described as flashing and red in color., The observer noticed the objects while on his way to school., The sighting lasted for about 25 minutes before the objects disappeared behind trees., Initial analysis concluded that the sighted objects were likely conventional aircraft.
witness description: A high school junior in Aiken, SC, with fair reliability.
